subject: Football
Concussions
Sports Injuries
Pensions and Retirement Plans
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. is being sued by several thousand retired players who accuse the league of concealing a link between head hits and brain injuries; the league denies the accusation.
snippet: The N.F.L. is being sued by several thousand retired players who accuse the league of concealing a link between head hits and brain injuries; the league denies the accusation.
